column4: anybody know how to change the default resolution in xfce? I'm in a real tight spot right now and could use some help
i'm just looking for a file path
well theres a program to change it within the session
and somehow my default res is 1024x768
causes major problems when i go to login
the command i mentioned can be used within the session...
i need it outside of the session
and plus that doesnt work for some reason anyway
i cant figure out these keys
does that answer your question? afaik, xfce doesn't have a resolution config built in :-/
